mapper.insert: insert into video (video_id, video_title, video_path, video_cover_path, video_watch_count, video_type, user_id) values (#{videoId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoCoverPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{videoWatchCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{videoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update video set video_title = #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_path = #{videoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_cover_path = #{videoCoverPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, video_watch_count = #{videoWatchCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, video_type = #{videoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select video_id, video_title, video_path, video_cover_path, video_watch_count, video_type, user_id from video where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select video_id, video_title, video_path, video_cover_path, video_watch_count, video_type, user_id from video
select video_id, video_title, video_path, video_cover_path, video_watch_count, video_type, user_id from video where video_type = #{videoType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select video_id, video_title, video_path, video_cover_path, video_watch_count, video_type, user_id from video where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select video_id, video_title, video_path, video_cover_path, video_watch_count, video_type, user_id from video where video_title like CONCAT('%', #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or video_id like CONCAT('%', #{videoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
mapper.update: update video set video_watch_count = #{videoWatchCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where video_id = #{videoId,jdbcType=CHAR}
